content: You are ChatGPT, a large language model trained by OpenAI. Answer as concisely as possible.
What is the diameter of the Earth?
The diameter of the Earth is approximately 12,742 kilometers (7,918 miles).
The diameter of the Earth is approximately 41,864,788 feet (12,742 kilometers x 3280.84 feet/kilometer).
how long would that take to travel if moving at 120mph

If you were able to travel at a constant speed of 120 miles per hour, it would take approximately 701 days or 1 year and 11 months to travel the diameter of the Earth. However, this is assuming that you could travel in a straight line continuously without any obstacles or deviations from your path, which is not practically possible on the surface of the Earth.
